name: Bounzy Ball-Block breaker
description:
Swipe your finger to use the launcher shot the balls ,make the balls jump to bricks and try to go as far as you can in this fun and addictive game.

Collect balls and make an endless ball chain!
Very easy to play but very hard to reach high scores!
Challenge your friends: who will be the King of the hop, and rise to the top?!

GAME FEATURES:
* Free to play
* Endless gameplay
* Simple tap control
* Challenge your friends with the best highscore

Challenge your friends: who will be the King of the hop, and rise to the top?!
